summary: Two young children living illegally in a model apartment outside Boston are left to fend for themselves when their hardworking mother disappears.
cast: Cindy Cheung|Michael Chen|Crystal Chiu|Stephen Gevedon|Frank Pando|Kieran Campion|Jackson Ning|Remmi Franklin|Yan Xi|Suzan Mikiel|Ruth Zhang|Yu Lu|Ronald Thomas|Lynn Mastio Rice|Katie Kreisler|Kathleen Kwan|Han Tang|Dustin Sullivan|Wai Ching Ho|Lee Wong|Kenneth Lee|Karlene Baptiste|Amy Chang|Ai Cheng|Avery Pearson|Robert Kelly|Michael Pemberton|Janine Mahoney|Jared Sprague|Mellini Kantayya|Laurie Williams|Linda Behrman|Jim Norris|Madeline Bartolotti|Nicholas Bartolotti|Damani Clachar|Christopher De Cambra|Dan Eberle|James N. Galione|Christopher Gresham|Jonathan Gresham|Schyanne Halfkenny|Kristin Ito|Anthony D. Jones|Young Luo|Tinh On|Samantha Rogers|Caleb Rugg|John Sanmartin|Andrew Smith|George Sprague|Carly Tamer|Janis Grossman|Brittany Natale|Pamela Price
title: Children of Invention
